bug.question: I have wings and love flowers. I make yummy honey! What am I?
I wiggle and crawl, and then turn into something beautiful that flies! What am I?
I am red with black spots, and I'm considered lucky! What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I like to eat aphids on plants.
🔴 I'm often a symbol of good fortune.

bug.question: I march in lines and carry food back to my home. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small and strong.
🏠 I live underground in a colony.

bug.question: I jump very high, and my legs are long. I like to eat grass. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I can jump far across the meadow.

bug.question: I light up the night with my bright glow! What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 You can see me best when it's dark.

bug.question: I have many legs and spin a sticky web to catch my food. What am I?

hints.text: 🪰 Flies get stuck in my home.

bug.question: I am a noisy insect that makes a loud buzzing sound in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I spend most of my life underground.
☀️ I'm common in the heat of summer.

bug.question: I look like a stick to hide from birds. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I am very good at camouflage.

bug.question: I can walk on water. What am I?

hints.text: ⛸️ I use surface tension to glide.

cosmos.question: I am big and bright and shine in the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I look like a giant ball of fire, but don't get too close!
🕶️ You need sunglasses to look at me!

cosmos.question: I am round and you live on me. I am home to trees and bees! What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I have lots of green and blue
🐾 You can walk all over me!

cosmos.question: I am white and shiny and come out at night. Sometimes I am round, sometimes I am not! What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 Some people say I am made of cheese!

cosmos.question: I am a tiny light far, far away. There are so many of me we light up the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌃 You can see me at night when it's dark

cosmos.question: I am a giant group of stars all spinning together. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I look like a spiral in space

cosmos.question: I am a hot ball of gas, much bigger than the Earth, but not as bright as the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I have a big red spot

cosmos.question: I am a giant collection of dust and ice that sometimes visits the inner solar system and grows a tail. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I have a tail when near the Sun
🚀 Some are very famous and return periodically

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ursa I might be a bear
🔱 You can use me to navigate

cosmos.question: I am the force that keeps you on the ground and planets orbiting the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 An apple falling from a tree might help you understand

cosmos.question: I am everything there is: all the stars, planets, galaxies, and even you! What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I contain everything we know and don't know
